item.title: Auto workers union condemns Hyundai working conditions in wake of federal raid on Georgia site
item.description: UAW condemns Hyundai for poor worker safety record following immigration raid at Georgia electric car battery factory that detained 475 people.

item.title: Mystery company's $1.6B data center proposed for Wisconsin farmland draws residents' ire
